column4: I was wondering where exactly I need to input my virtual host tags in my httpd.conf file for Apache (LAMPP setup)
I was wondering where exactly I need to input my virtual host tags in my httpd.conf file for Apache (LAMPP setup)
In the debian method of configuration, they go in /etc/apache2/sites-available/ which then get symlinked to sites-enabled to enable them (via a2ensite)
Well, /sitess-enabled/default has a virtualhost, so you can edit that, or add to it, or copy it orwhatnot
